extension.news: [B]+ 2.0.0[/B] ~ (06-04-2020) - Proper Python 3 support - Added support for hastebin.com - Removed "youtube.api.enable" setting for post 6.7.0 youtube addon versions - Added support for google's client.json file from the credentials screen > If api_key is not found in the json file, youtube setup will ask to be entered manually > You can enter it in the file prior to the setup just by adding an additional key, see client.json example - Added the following translations: > Romanian: thanks to tmihai20 > Dutch: thanks to dagwieers > Russian: thanks to vlmaksime
